function: Provides a user interface to search for stocks and retrieve real-time stock information.

Over the search button to highlight its clickable state.

resource_dependency.stock_info_schema: Database schema includes: stock_id (primary key), ticker_symbol (string), company_name (string), current_price (decimal), volume (integer), last_updated (timestamp).
resource_dependency.backend_stock_api: API endpoint '/api/stocks' that accepts GET requests with query parameters for stock_code or company_name.
resource_dependency.database_connection_config: Environment variables: DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp.

function: Fetches and displays real-time stock information from backend APIs connected to an external PostgreSQL database.

interaction_and_states.description: On a row in the results table to view detailed stock information.

interaction_and_states.description: On a checkbox to toggle content inclusion in the report.
On the dropdown to select a report format.

On 'Download Report' to save the file locally in the chosen format.
